Open Source Projects

I started several open-source projects, including the following:

  • Aquarium: An Aspect-Oriented Programming toolkit for Ruby. Since I no longer work in the Ruby community, Iâ€™m looking for someone to take over this project.
  • Contract4J: An AspectJ-based, Design by Contract tool for Java 5+, written in AspectJ.
  • Stampede: A flyweight work flow scheduling tool, written as a reaction to bloated, hard-to-use tools like Oozie. It relies on classic UNIX tools, like bash, make, and cron.

Other projects can be found on GitHub.
